transcript:
ing Tfkhon had already advised the architect not to go the prince with his report. 
"Do you hear how he's walking?" said Tfk- hon, drawing the architect's attention to the sound of the prince's footsteps. "Stepping flat on his heels we know what that means " 
However, at nine o'clock the prince, in his velvet coat with a sable collar and cap, went out for his usual walk. It had snowed the day before and the path to the hothouse, along which the prince was in the habit of walking, had been swept
